thread.title: Cristiano Ronaldo is about to overtake an English legend - and set another RIDICULOUS goalscoring record
thread.title_full: Cristiano Ronaldo is about to overtake an English legend - and set another RIDICULOUS goalscoring record

author: Jon Moody
title: Cristiano Ronaldo is about to overtake an English legend - and set another RIDICULOUS goalscoring record
text:
Get daily   Could   
We've written lots and lots about the absurdly confident Cristiano Ronaldo over the years. 
Often this focuses on his random off-pitch activities, like becoming a Bugatti test driver or showcasing his summer pants. 
That can have the tendency of taking the focus off his day job on the pitch - something we certainly won't allow to happen today. 
That's because it's another day, another ridiculous footballing feat for Cristiano Ronaldo. (Photo: Helios de la Rubia) 
His bullet header equaliser against Real Betis in Real Madrid's 2-1 victory last night was the 366th league goal of his career - equalling the incredible record set by Jimmy Greaves. 
England legend Greaves scored the huge number of goals across his career at Chelsea, AC Milan, Tottenham Hotspur and West Ham United - while Ronaldo's haul has come from stints at Sporting Lisbon, Manchester United and Real Madrid. (Photo: Antonio Villalba) 
So it means Ronaldo is now just a single goal away from becoming the most prolific goalscorer Europe has EVER seen. 
There's little doubt that'll happen within the next couple of weeks at the latest. He's probably thinking about his celebration for it already. 
We wonder what the odds are on it involving stripping off? poll loading Who is the better player? 3000+ VOTES SO FAR
